<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Convincing Illusion](/Feats.aspx?ID=1837) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=166" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 142 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5)

**Trigger**
A creature succeeded, but didn't critically succeed, at a Perception check or Will save to disbelieve an [illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=92) from a spell that you cast.

**Requirements**
You are within 30 feet of the observer and the illusion.

</column>

---

You use your deceptive skills to make your illusions seem even more real. Attempt a [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) check against the target's Perception DC. If you succeed, the target fails to disbelieve the illusion.
name: Convincing Illusion
requirement: You are within 30 feet of the observer and the illusion.
